WorkItem.Description:
Hello, 

I'm trying to create Music Store and I'm a bit stucked in the part where we have to add the App.Data to the project. The App.Data option in the project is deactivated. Can please someone give more details on how to add the data to the project?

Thank you in advance.

Comments.Message: You need to make sure that you've clicked the MvcMusicStore project name in the Solution Explorer before going to 'Project' on the menu bar in VS. It will remain deactivated if the solution name has the focus in the Solution Explorer. So this is not a bug with the Music Store, but rather a characteristic of VS2010 and is more appropriate as a Discussion item.
